text: I'm 27 years old I am 25 years old I'm
30 years old and I still believe in
Santa the one thing that um proved it
Beyond a doubt for me there was I lived
in a spot with a lot of snow have a very
big yard and I remember one Christmas we
woke up and I don't know why we went
outside but we had to go outside for
something in the middle of my yard was a
giant sleigh track and in front of that
reindeer hoofprints and like 3T away
from any direction whatsoever so like
you had to like fly into the middle of
the the only explanation is flying into
the middle of my yard and Landing
obviously we would do the mall Santa
Claus we would go and we would tell
Santa what we wanted for Christmas and
there was one time when Santa called my
dad by name and he said Chris good to
see you and we were all like Dad how did
he how did he know your name and he was
like the magic of Christmas he remembers
when I was a kid I was really anxious
and I was awake to wait for Santa Claus
so I went downstairs to check the
Christmas tree and it was nothing so
what I did next I went upstairs I went
back to my bed and it was like okay I
need to go back to sleep but of course
as a kid I couldn't so I was like 15 or
20 minutes like really really trying
like okay you know what I'm going to
check again 20 minutes later of course I
went downstairs and right in there it
was a bike and some video games and some
stuff for my sisters and it was the
whole couch and the whole chis down the
Christmas tree was full of presents I'm
like how did that happen when I was a
kid we did everything we could to try to
always catch or find Santa and when we
did try to stay up and we did try to
catch Santa every time without fail we'd
always fall asleep and when I woke
myself up because I missed him again I
would hear slay BS outside my window
when my brother and I were really little
we were fighting like cats and dogs it
was right before Christmas time and I
don't remember what we were fighting
about but we were just Relentless going
at it and my dad finally said that's it
I'm calling Santa and so he went to the
phone on the wall in the kitchen grabbed
it just dialed it up and he goes Santa
this is Randy Gordon here I have two
misbehaved children that I need you to
speak with and my brother and I Jaws
dropped speechless could not even
believe that Dad got Santa on the phone
that quickly he passed the phone to me
and probably 5 years old scared little
5-year-old talking on the phone with
Santa and he's telling me I have to
behave we were Angels the rest of the
year so I would wake up in the morning
and I would legit see like muddy
Footprints all throughout the floor and
they were like these big Footprints they
had like some chunks of dirt uh like an
actual boot imprint so that's how I knew
Santa was there and I still believed
that the reindeer landed on the roof and
sometimes I would see actual Prince like
hoof prints in the house as well so I
was always a little weirded out there
was a giant animal in my living room
Santa's definitely real he's a spirit
that um brings joy to and can be
embodied in everyone and anyone Santa
is what compels you to want to spend
time with family to want to give back to
the community to want to be and share
your life with people that you love
